name: Classic Beats
description:
The game is under development! Classic Beats

Catch all notes and remake the most classical songs of all time!

Play the redeisgned most famous song of Mozart, Beethoven, vivald and more!

Simple controls and challenging levels!

Sooner will be available on Google Play

Controls
  • A  ->  Go left
  • D  -> Go Right

You can also use the arrow keys!

We appreciate your feedback!

Game running slow?  Try downloading it!
